manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Step 1: Treat with OLAPLEX No. 3 Hair Perfector Step 2: Cleanse with OLAPLEX No. 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo Step 3: Follow with OLAPLEX No. 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner Next page 1 Treat 2 Cleanse 3 Condition

Olaplex No. 5 A Highly Moisturizing and Reparative Conditioner Leaves hair easy to manage, shiny, and healthier with each use. Key Benefits: - Repairs hair and maintains bonds within the hair - Adds shine - Strengthens

Where should you use Olaplex No. 5? Focus on ends and distribute evenly. Is Olaplex No. 5 safe on all hair types? Olaplex is for all hair textures and hair types whether chemically treated or not. How often can you use Olaplex No. 5? Olaplex No. 5 is formulated for daily or every wash use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE LOVE LOVE the shampoo and conditioner!
reviews.reviewText: These 2 products … a little goes a long way, so the cost for my use is about the same as store bought, (but need to use less product amount and these being a much higher quality product). My hair has been much more manageable over this past year: much less severity of frizz with my gray and dyed hair. My hair texture to the touch has greatly improved, and no longer feels or looks dry. Is actually shiny/silky now. My hair is shoulder length. Been using these 2 products for over a year, and has helped make the big difference. I highly recommend this product line. I also checked into: best use of styling tools for least damage, use a Satin pillowcase now, use a microfiber cloth correctly before using a dryer now correctly also, … all of this and these 2 products have really helped my hair’s appearance go from drab, dry, frizzy … to now: healthy, shiny, silky, with movement and a youthful appearance. I’m sticking with what is working for me now… such a dramatic difference from last year+!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love Olaplex products. They make a big difference in your hair. I've been using them for several months and I get a lot of compliments on my hair. Be aware, there is a system depending on your need. Go to their website and check which products you need and in what order you should use them. If you follow their recommendations you will see a difference, otherwise you are just wasting your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After a long time of hearing about this product, I finally gave in during the Prime Days of sale. Wow! Just wow! My hair which is very thin and not as much of it, looks lush after this shampoo! It feels soft but with substance. It takes just a dime size of the product to get a ton of lather, so this small bottle will last a long time! The conditioner is light, it glides effortlessly on my highlighted hair. I am a huge fan, instantly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: At first I thought spending this much on conditioner was insane, but my incredibly rude hair is actually pretty happy with it. It's way softer now and doesn't talk back nearly as much. Our relationship still needs work, but this conditioner has definitely helped!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Probably won't buy again
reviews.reviewText: I really liked this product, I think it's done good things for my hair, but the cap can be extremely hard to open. Every time I open it I'm afraid I'm going to end up skinning my knuckles and/or damaging my nail (which is the only way to get it to open). I'm not planning on buying it again for this reason. There's too many good products in the market to use one with this sort of a dumb issue.If it had a pump instead of the cap, I probably would get it again.Oh, I suppose I should mention too that I had to exchange the first bottle I got because it was a milk-like texture and it smelled like something that has gone bad. I had no issue with the return or anything, and the bottle I received from the exchange was perfectly fine, but I'm curious if anyone else has had that issue!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good product
reviews.reviewText: I've been using olaplex for over a year now and notice a huge difference in the health of my hair. It's definitely pricey, but it's worth it to have healthy, silky hair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome, didn’t believe the hype
reviews.reviewText: My daughter has been wanting the shampoo and conditioner for a while - I finally bought them for a Christmas gift. So I have been alternating both the shampoo and conditioner with my purple shampoo/conditioner for my blonde hair. I can definitely see and feel a difference in the decreased frizz, increased shine and overall health of my hair in just a few weeks. My daughter is thrilled that I am a convert too, I had been resistant to spending the money. I did get the conditioner on sale before Christmas, but the shampoo was full price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Only takes a pea size amount. Leaves my hair so silky and shiny. Wished I started this years ago
Me deja el pelo súper suave y muy brillante. Me encantó, lo seguiré comprando!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve really struggled with my hair since being menopausal. Thinning & breakage. Using this with the shampoo has literally transformed my hair’s condition - noticeable from first use. It’s like magic. Could not be happier. Pricey but worth every penny

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Brough for my granddaughter who continues to dye her hair

reviews.reviewTitle: A little shampoo is enough for the froth to come.
reviews.reviewText: Both the shampoo and conditioner both are wonderful. Especially if you live in hard water region this shampoo is perfect
